item.title: 我们都在经历一场大变革，与我们息息相关的、我们所依赖的服务正在变成一大堆垃圾。这是令人沮丧的。令人士气低落。甚至令人恐惧
item.description: We’re all living through a great enshittening, in which the services that matter to us, that we rely on, are turning into giant piles of s**t. It’s frustrating. It’s demoralising. It’s even terrifying on.ft.com/48bnYyv

item.title: @FT.RT：埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）争取 560 亿美元薪酬（可能是人类历史上最大的薪酬）的斗争表明：是时候对亿万富翁征税了。在 @FT 中，我试图驳斥双方愚蠢的论点，并说：这是可行的。在不同的地方征收不同的税
item.description: Elon Musk's fight for a $56 billion pay package (possibly the biggest in human history) shows: it's time to tax billionaires. In @FT I try to dismiss the silly arguments on both sides and say: it's feasible. Different taxes could work in different places on.ft.com/3SAsJf4

item.title:
RT by @FT：@courtney_ft 报道称，虽然纳杰日丁在俄罗斯最高法院面临的追索权很少，但他告诉支持者不要退缩。
"我请求你们不要放弃。发生了许多人无法相信的事情：公民们感受到了俄罗斯变革的可能性"。
item.description:
While Nadezhdin faces little recourse in Russia’s Supreme Court, he told supporters not to back down, @courtney_ft reports.

“I ask you not to give up. Something happened that many could not believe: citizens sensed the possibility of change in Russia.”

ft.com/content/4539c50b-146f…
